name: electron-affinity
description: IPC via method calls in Electron
author: Joseph T. Lapp <arachnojoe@gmail.com>

scripts.test: tsc && shx mkdir -p build/test/window-scripts && shx cp test/window-scripts/dummy.html build/test/window-scripts/dummy.html && node_modules/.bin/rollup -c && ./test/run-tests
scripts.pub: tsc && shx cp package.json build/src && shx cp README.md build/src && shx cp LICENSE build/src && shx rm build/src/*.map && shx rm build/src/lib/*.map && yarn publish build/src && rm build/src/package.json build/src/README.md build/src/LICENSE
